title: Task 1: Describe form, style, materials, technique, or content
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does not accurately describe a visual characteristic of the work.
Response accurately describes one visual characteristic of the work.
Response accurately describes two visual characteristics of the work.

title: Task 2: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, or content shape the work
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: The response does not accurately explain how a characteristic of the work creates a sense of balance.
The response accurately explains how one characteristic of the work creates a sense of balance.
The response accurately explains how two characteristics of the work create a sense of balance.

title: Task 3: Explain how the work shown is typical of Greek sculpture created during the fifth century B.C.E.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately explain how the work shown is typical of Greek sculpture created during the fifth century B.C.E.
The response accurately explains how the work shown is typical of Greek sculpture created during the fifth century B.C.E.
